flags.description: Seller in Type|ID format (Broker or Trucker)
flags.name: --seller
flags.validation: Format: Type|ID; allowed types: Broker or Trucker (e.g., Broker|123).

flags.description: Buyer in Type|ID format (Customer or Broker)
flags.name: --buyer
flags.validation: Format: Type|ID; allowed types: Customer or Broker (e.g., Customer|456).

permissions: Authentication required (API token) and authorization per rate agreement policy.
validation_notes: Argument <id> is required. At least one of --name, --status, --seller, or --buyer must be provided. --status must be active or inactive when provided. --seller must be Type|ID with Broker or Trucker. --buyer must be Type|ID with Customer or Broker.
